gitlab_file_added: ${user} added file ${filename} to GitLab dataset ${dataset} in ${node}
gitlab_file_removed: ${user} removed file ${filename} from GitLab dataset ${dataset} in ${node}
gitlab_dataset_published: ${user} published a new version of GitLab dataset ${dataset} on ${node}
gitlab_study_released: ${user} published a new version of GitLab dataset ${study} to ${node}
